action.content:
You’re guiding me through Mapworld to reach an Escape Room. I don’t know what it looks like, but you have its image.

First, describe your image in this format and nothing else:
DESCRIPTION: your description of the image

Whenever I ask a question, answer based only on your image in this format and nothing else:
ANSWER: your answer
action.label: context

action.content:
DESCRIPTION: A long, well-lit hallway with a shiny floor, bulletin boards on the left wall covered with various papers, and doors on the right side. At the end of the hallway, there is a set of double doors leading to another area.

ANSWER: The hallway is straight and leads directly to the double doors at the end.
action.label: response

action.content:
You’re exploring Mapworld, a network of various connected rooms, and your aim is to reach the Escape Room.
Here is the description of what the Escape Room looks like:  description: a long, well-lit hallway with a shiny floor, bulletin boards on the left wall covered with various papers, and doors on the right side. at the end of the hallway, there is a set of double doors leading to another area.

answer: the hallway is straight and leads directly to the double doors at the end

ESCAPE
